item.nucleartech.painting_of_a_cartoon_p: Yellow horse beats blue horse, that's a proven fact!

very small amount of a strange new element.

item.nucleartech.charred_crystal.desc0: Also a real horn. Weird, right?

block.nucleartech.oil_deposit.desc0: You weren't supposed to mine that.
block.nucleartech.oil_deposit.desc1: Come on, get a derrick you doofus.
